seo.title: Blackriver Ramps – Christmas Strategy
seo.description: Discover how Polything helped Blackriver triple holiday sales with a data-driven marketing strategy. Learn how channel diversification and efficient ad spend bo

body.raw:
Blackriver’s 297% Christmas Season Sales Surge

Overview

Blackriver is a leading e-commerce brand in the sports equipment sector, known for its high-quality products and loyal customer base. With the critical holiday season approaching, Blackriver aimed to significantly boost sales without proportionately increasing their ad spend.

Objectives

The main goal was to maximise holiday sales while maintaining efficiency in ad spend, focusing on:

  • Reducing cost per purchase to ensure higher profitability.
  • Increasing total revenue and purchase volume.
  • Improving Return on Ad Spend (ROAS).

The Challenge

Despite their efforts, Blackriver faced significant challenges:

  • Rising Ad Costs: Year-over-year platform ad costs increased by 18%, straining the budget.
  • Technical Limitations: A recent website relaunch caused tracking inconsistencies, making it difficult to measure campaign effectiveness accurately.
  • Inefficient Scaling: Previous attempts to scale campaigns resulted in diminishing returns and higher customer acquisition costs.

Blackriver needed a solution that would allow them to scale profitably and efficiently—especially during the competitive Black Friday and Christmas sales periods.

Strategic Solution

We proposed a comprehensive, multi-channel strategy focused on maximising efficiency and reach:

  • Channel Diversification – Expanded ad spend to include both Meta (Facebook & Instagram) and Google Ads, ensuring a broader yet targeted reach.
  • Campaign Optimization
    • Implemented Performance Max campaigns on Google for advanced targeting.
    • Leveraged broad targeting on Meta to capture high-intent audiences.
  • Real-Time Budget Allocation – Monitored campaign performance daily and reallocated budgets to the best-performing channels and creatives. Including AI-driven ad set budget optimisation.
  • Enhanced Targeting and Creative: Created custom audiences and ad variations to improve engagement and conversion rates.

Implementation

  • Campaign Phases – Rolled out in defined stages, each phase targeted specific audience segments with tailored messaging and offers.
  • Content Deployment – Utilised a mix of media formats to maintain high engagement levels, ensuring content resonated with the target audience’s interests and needs.
  • Tech Integration – Applied the latest AI technology for campaign monitoring and adjustments, ensuring optimal performance throughout the campaign duration.

The Outcomes

The strategic shift delivered outstanding results for Blackriver:

  • Total Revenue: – Increased by 123.93%
  • Number of Purchases: Surged by 297.35%.
  • ROAS Improvement: Increased from 8.65 to 10.89 (+25.90%).
  • Cost Efficiency: Cost per purchase decreased by 55.25%.

Channel-Specific Performance:

  • Google Ads – ROAS: 12.64
  • Meta (Facebook & Instagram) – ROAS: 9.38

Segmented and Targeted Approach

Insights and Learnings

  • Strategic Diversification Works – By expanding to Google Ads, Blackriver unlocked a new high-performing channel that delivered a 12.64 ROAS.
  • Efficient Budget Use – Real-time budget allocation allowed Blackriver to capitalize on high-converting opportunities without inflating costs.
  • Advanced Targeting Delivers – Broad targeting and Performance Max campaigns proved essential in capturing both top-of-funnel and high-intent customers.

Client Feedback

This is what BlackRiver had to say about the campaign:

“We knew our holiday sales had potential, but we never imagined we’d more than double our revenue in one season.

Their strategy didn’t just scale our business—it made our entire marketing operation more efficient, saving us money while growing our profits. We’re already planning how to go even bigger next year!”

Denise Herman – CEO, Blackriver Ramps

Conclusion

This case study highlights the impact of a well-structured, data-driven marketing strategy. Visit our Services page to learn how we can drive your business towards its goals, or contact us directly for a tailored consultation. Let's replicate this success story together.

Read More

Client: Blackriver Ramps
Strategy: Chris
Production: In-House
